revised_title: Comet Halley and the Study of Diffuse Matter in the Solar System
tldr: This article discusses the significance of Comet Halley and other studies on diffuse matter in the Solar System. It explores the various ways in which astronomers study celestial bodies and the material particles that travel between Earth and our stellar surroundings. The article also highlights the importance of understanding the past evolution of the Solar System through the study of comets.
